overview_of_class: Advanced course for developing communication skills in Spanish for business purposes. Emphasis on language skills for the global marketplace: specialized terminology; writing; comprehension of cultural nuances in the Spanish-speaking business world.
name: Spanish for Professions: Business
title: WCAS SPANISH 206-0-21 Spanish for Professions: Business

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Advanced course for developing communication skills in Spanish for business purposes. Emphasis on language skills for the global marketplace: specialized terminology; writing; comprehension of cultural nuances in the Spanish-speaking business world.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Spanish 201, AP 5 on the Spanish Language Exam, or departmental placement
Three class meetings a week

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: SPANISH
